mapper.insert: insert into member(id, password, email, nickname, name, phone) values( #{id}, #{password}, #{email}, #{nickname}, #{name}, #{phone} )

insert into address(member_id, postcode, jibun_address, road_address, detail_address, extra_address) values( #{memberId}, #{postcode}, #{jibunAddress}, #{roadAddress}, #{detailAddress}, #{extraAddress} )
mapper.update: update member set nickname = #{nickname}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where id = #{id}
